headline: BathyBeacon Prototype
description: The first working draft of the BathyBeacon Project — a deep-sea observation platform using passive artificial bioluminescence. This post documents the shift from concept to physical experimentation.
whyItMatters: This post turns idea into device. It’s not just about observing squid — it’s about building a platform that could allow us to meet the deep on its terms. It’s humble, hopeful engineering.
articleExcerpt: The real results are that AI can enable an unskilled individual like me... Imagine what a smart person would be capable of!
